headline: Should Realty Income’s (O) US$750 Million Convertible Note Offering Reshape Its Income-Focused Story?
summary: In early January 2026, Realty Income Corporation completed a private Rule 144A offering of US$750,000,000 in senior unsecured, callable and convertible notes due January 15, 2029. The move adds a new layer of flexible, unsecured financing that can support debt repayment, acquisitions and portfolio expansion without immediately issuing new equity. Next, we’ll examine how this sizeable convertible note issuance could influence Realty Income’s income-focused investment narrative and growth...
